Talk_56:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease_00>That was a sound explosion!


<sp:3:0:2:0100><sp:0:2:2:6400>You rung that bell for all it's worth.
That was fantastic!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_23: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>I get it...<sp:5:1:0> I'll clean things up here, then.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:SurpriseS_00>Are you leaving?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I can't refund you your <clr:0000>30 rupees <clr:ffff>if
you go.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Throw something at it with as much
force as you can.<sp:5:1:0> Do that, and the
bell will answer.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>Oh yeah, also... <sp:5:0:0>I built this thing all on my
own, <sp:5:1:0>and parts ain't cheap, so I gotta
charge ya a fee. <sp:5:0:0>You get it.
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>The trick to really ring it is to throw
somethin' real <clr:0000>heavy<clr:ffff>, real <clr:0000>fast<clr:ffff>.

Now, show me what you've got!
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Here, take this.<sp:5:1:0> It's a thank-you for
giving that bell a good smack!
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Wanna try the <clr:0000>test of strength <clr:ffff>again?<sp:5:1:0>
It'd be <clr:0000>30 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>But I know you can go even louder than
that!<sp:5:1:0> C'mon, make it sing.
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkPositive_00>Well, I can't refund your <clr:0000>30 rupees<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> You
sure you're done?
Talk_10: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>Oh. You don't have enough rupees, huh?
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Yup!<sp:5:1:0> Your goal is to make the <clr:0000>bell<clr:ffff> at the
top of this here tower ring as loud as
ya can.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease>Whoa, I thought that was a monster
roaring.<sp:5:1:0> That bell sure is loud!
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, once you get it organized, come on
back and I'll give you a nice, shiny <clr:0000>ruby<clr:ffff>!
Talk_12: <sp:3:0:2:0100>Ya did pretty OK...<sp:5:1:0>but you can do better.
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Did you get your pouch all organized?<sp:5:0:0>
Then I've got an ore for you!
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>That was better than your last one!<sp:5:1:0> But I
bet you can hit it even harder.
Talk_48: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkPositive>Looks like your pouch is still full...
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, once you get it organized, come on
back and I'll give you a nice, shiny <clr:0000>topaz<clr:ffff>!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_00>Maybe you need some ringing practice.
<sp:5:1:0>Take all the time ya need.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>So loud!<sp:5:0:0> I love it!<sp:5:1:0> I could sit here all day
listenin' to you doin' that.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Hoho, that musta been at least <clr:0000><sp:2:10:22:1c004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00530063006f0072006500ffff0001><clr:ffff> on
the <clr:0000>mega-ding scale<clr:ffff>.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Why, you ask? <sp:5:0:0>Because I thought up a
great new gameâ€”a <clr:0000>test of strength<clr:ffff>!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease_01>I thought that was thunder, but then I
realized it was you!<sp:5:1:0> Today I learned what
that bell is capable of.
And what you're capable of!<sp:5:1:0> You're
amazing. My head is still ringing!
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Heh, I made myself quite the tower, eh?<sp:5:1:0>
Just look at that.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>Well, OK...<sp:5:1:0> Come by again when you
wanna put your strength to the test.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Then head back to the tower,<sp:5:1:0> and get
to ringing!
Talk_01: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>And! <sp:5:0:0>I put that bell right on top.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Wanna take my <clr:0000>test of strength<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
One try is <clr:0000>30 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_02: <sp:3:0:2:0000>It's <clr:0000>30 rupees<clr:ffff> per try. <sp:5:0:0>Wanna give it a go?
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>A visitor? In this weather? <sp:5:0:0>Wouldn't have
expected that.
Talk_39: <sp:3:0:2:0800>You even came here in the rain.
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, once you get it organized, come on
back and I'll give you a nice, sparkly <clr:0000>opal<clr:ffff>!
Talk_51: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkPositive>Oh. Never mind. Your pouch is full.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>There's a <clr:0000>bell<clr:ffff> at the top of the tower,<sp:5:1:0>
and ya gotta ring it real loud.
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>I wanna hear you make some racket
again!<sp:5:1:0> I can hardly wait.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Once you ring the bell, the game ends.<sp:5:0:0>
And you only get one ring per round.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>That made me jump! That was you? <sp:5:1:0>Well
it sounded fantastic.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>If you're into bells, I made a fun, little
<clr:0000>test of strength<clr:ffff> that uses one.<sp:5:1:0> Just let
me know if you're interested.
Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now that was a ring! Wanna try out my
<clr:0000>bell-ringin' game<clr:ffff>?
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Wanna try my <clr:0000>test of strength<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0> It's
<clr:0000>30 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Aw...<sp:5:1:0> Well, you can come back if you feel
like giving that bell a good whack.
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>You're welcome to all the stuff over there.<sp:5:1:0>
Some of it's left over from when I built
the tower.
And some of it's this weird <clr:0000>junk<clr:ffff> I didn't
really know what to do with... <sp:5:1:0>Anyway,
you can use whatever you want.
